      • intersect

        public boolean intersect(SegmentNode q)
        Testing if two figures are intersected. This interface implements standard intersection testing that ignores the semantics of the X- and Y- axis. Processing the semantics issues before calling this method. A sample usage, please @see heap_sensitive_intersection
        Parameters:
